ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We misled you and we were ourselves misled.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For we had led you astray. In fact we ourselves were astray."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So we led you astray; we ourselves were strayed.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We mislead you and we ourselves had also gone astray."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “We therefore led you astray, for we ourselves were astray!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So we led you astray because we were ourselves astray."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So we led you astray, for we ourselves were erring.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Therefore we perverted you, and we ourselves were perverts.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thus we misled you. Lo! we were (ourselves) astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We led you astray as we were ourselves astray."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: We seduced you astray; verily we were ourselves the seduced ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So we perverted you, for we were perverse [ourselves].’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We led you astray: for truly we were ourselves astray."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So we led you astray because we were ourselves astray."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: we perverted you, indeed, we were perverts'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We seduced you. We were seducers.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And we led you to deviation; indeed, we were deviators."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:32] So we led you astray — the reason for which is given by their saying — indeed we [ourselves] were astray’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thus we misled you) from Religion. (Lo! we were (ourselves) astray) from Religion.
